price: 16. Le jour où Nous sévirons de Notre plus grande colère, Nous aurons tiré vengeance.
arabic: يَوۡمَ نَبۡطِشُ ٱلۡبَطۡشَةَ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ إِنَّا مُنتَقِمُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yawma nabṭishu al-baṭshata al-kub'rā innā muntaqimūna
